execution_quality: Agent systematically searched for evidence of feature flags and session memory through grep patterns, read key configuration files, and executed a bash command to verify findings. Work was methodical but the agent encountered errors during execution.
work_category: Research and investigation task investigating feature flag configuration and session memory context, followed by documentation updates.
summary: Agent completed the investigative research phase (finding evidence of feature flags and session memory) but the actual requested documentation work was deferred to a follow-up task. The research was appropriately scoped and the agent recovered from encountered errors, but the follow-up message 'ok, make notes about that in the feature doc' suggests the user expected the documentation update to be completed in the same interaction rather than discovered in the next message.
follow_up_pattern: User accepted the findings and issued a follow-up task to document them, indicating the investigative work was useful but the primary deliverable was documentation.
